revision.comment: Add release date/price and add OpenWrt to TPFirmware
revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=Archer C7 |revision=v2.x |series=AC1750 |upc=845973070601 |asin=B00BUSDVBQ;US; |newegg=9SIAFVF75F2725 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=common |price=89.99 |est_release_date=08/19/2014 |fcc_date=04/14/2014 |fcc_id=TE7C7V2 |ic_id=8853A-C7 |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9558;QCA9558-AT4A, PMV137.005B, 1252, TAIWAN; |cpu1_cspeed=720 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q128FV |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9751G6KB-25 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, Mini PCIe |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=2 |serial=yes,, internal,, 4-pin header,, 3.3V TTL |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9558;QCA9558-AT4A, PMV137.005B, 1252, TAIWAN; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=none |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe (oversized) |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9880-BR4A;QCA9880-BR4A, NFS459.00B, 1309, TAIWAN; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8327N;AR8327N-BL1A; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1G |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE5003L1;5003L1, 241JW, 1341 MY;3; |tp_firmware=DD-WRT, OpenWrt, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=TP-LINK_2.4GHz_XXXXXX, TP-LINK_5GHz_XXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^TP-LINK_2.4GHz_[A-F0-9]{6}$,,, ^TP-LINK_5GHz_[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin }} {{TagLine|AC1750 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit Router}} *[http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/?categoryid=2872&model=Archer+C7 Product page] *[http://www.tp-link.com/resources/simulator/Archer%20C7_2.0/ Firmware Interface] *[http://www.tp-link.com/en/support/download/?model=Archer+C7&version=V2 Downloads] *[http://www.tp-link.com/resources/document/Archer_C7_V2_User_Guide_1910010809.pdf User Guide] "2050500332" is silkscreened on the main board in the FCC photos. :"2052500400" is silkscreened on the wireless module. :The same text is silkscreened on the v1's board. The firmware is shared between v2 and v3, presumably the hardware is very similar. {{WiFiCert|WFA53887|06/26/2014}} ==Additional external links== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32498-tp-link-archer-c7-v2-reviewed Review on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :CPU: QCA9558 3x3 802.11abgn SoC :RAM: Winbond W9751G6JB 128MB DDR2 :Flash: Winbond W25Q128FV 16MB :Switch: Atheros AR8327 GbE 
 	TP-Link Archer C7 V2	TP-Link Archer C8
CPU	Qualcomm QCA9558	Broadcom BCM4708
Switch	Atheros AR8327		in BCM4708
RAM	128 MB			128 MB
Flash	16 MB			16 MB
2.4 GHz in Qualcomm QCA9558	Broadcom BCM4331
Radio - unident. PA (x3)	unident. PA (x3)
5 GHz 	Qualcomm QCA9880-BR4A	Broadcom BCM4360
Radio - SiGE 5005L PA (x3)	SiGE 5003L1 PA (x3)
